name: StarUML4KM3
short_description: StarUML4KM3 is a StarUML plugins that allows to handle and generates KM3 file from StarUML Class Diagrams. StarUML is an open source UML environment (staruml.sourceforge.net). KM3 is a textual language for metamodels (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KM3).
